title: To the supreme authority, the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England the humble petition of John Poyntz, alias Morris.
author: Poyntz, John, fl. 1647-1650.
notes: In fact, two petitions, the second entitled: To the honorable Henry Rolls lord chief justice of the Upper Bench: The humble petition of John Poyntz, alias Morris.
The second petition names John Lilburne, John Wildman, Robert Wakeman, and Mr. [Thomas] Fontleroy [i.e Fountleroy] to be his representatives in court.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
